member.name: T:System.Text.Decoder
member.summary: Converts a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of characters.

member.name: M:System.Text.Decoder.Convert(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Converts an array of encoded bytes to UTF-16 encoded characters and stores the result in a character array.
member.param: A byte array to convert.
The first element of bytes to convert.
The number of elements of bytes to convert.
An array to store the converted characters.
The first element of chars in which data is stored.
The maximum number of elements of chars to use in the conversion.
true to indicate that no further data is to be converted; otherwise, false.
When this method returns, contains the number of bytes that were used in the conversion. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this method returns, contains the number of characters from chars that were produced by the conversion. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this method returns, contains true if all the characters specified by byteCount were converted; otherwise, false. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

member.name: T:System.Text.Encoding
member.summary: Represents a character encoding.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes(System.String)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, encodes all the characters in the specified string into a sequence of bytes.
member.param: The string containing the characters to encode.
member.returns: A byte array containing the results of encoding the specified set of characters.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, encodes a set of characters from the specified string into the specified byte array.
member.param: The string containing the set of characters to encode.
The index of the first character to encode.
The number of characters to encode.
The byte array to contain the resulting sequence of bytes.
The index at which to start writing the resulting sequence of bytes.
member.returns: The actual number of bytes written into bytes.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encoding.GetChars(System.Byte[])
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, decodes all the bytes in the specified byte array into a set of characters.
member.param: The byte array containing the sequence of bytes to decode.
member.returns: A character array containing the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encoding.GetChars(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, decodes a sequence of bytes from the specified byte array into a set of characters.
member.param: The byte array containing the sequence of bytes to decode.
The index of the first byte to decode.
The number of bytes to decode.
member.returns: A character array containing the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encoding.GetString(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, decodes a sequence of bytes from the specified byte array into a .
member.param: The byte array containing the sequence of bytes to decode.
The index of the first byte to decode.
The number of bytes to decode.
member.returns: A that contains the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encoding.GetDecoder
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, obtains a decoder that converts an encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of characters.
member.returns: A Decoder that converts an encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of characters.

member.name: P:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8
member.summary: Gets an encoding for the UTF-8 format.
member.value: An encoding for the UTF-8 format.

member.name: T:System.Text.StringBuilder
member.summary: A Micro Framework port of the Full Framework StringBuilder. Contributed by Julius Friedman. Represents a mutable string of characters. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:System.Text.StringBuilder.MaxCapacity
member.summary: Gets the maximum capacity of this instance.
member.value: The maximum number of characters this instance can hold.

member.name: P:System.Text.StringBuilder.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the character at the specified character position in this instance.
member.param: The position of the character.
member.returns: The Unicode character at position index.

member.name: P:System.Text.StringBuilder.Capacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be contained in the memory allocated by the current instance.
member.value: The maximum number of characters that can be contained in the memory allocated by the current instance. Its value can range from Length to MaxCapacity.

member.name: P:System.Text.StringBuilder.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the current StringBuilder object.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilder.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StringBuilder class from the specified substring and capacity.
member.param: The string that contains the substring used to initialize the value of this instance. If value is null, the new StringBuilder will contain the empty string (that is, it contains Empty).
The position within value where the substring begins.
The number of characters in the substring.
The suggested starting size of the StringBuilder.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilder.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StringBuilder class using the specified string and capacity.
member.param: The string used to initialize the value of the instance. If value is null, the new StringBuilder will contain the empty string (that is, it contains Empty).
The suggested starting size of the StringBuilder.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilder.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StringBuilder class that starts with a specified capacity and can grow to a specified maximum.
member.param: The suggested starting size of the StringBuilder.
The maximum number of characters the current string can contain.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilder.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StringBuilder class using the specified capacity.
member.param: The suggested starting size of this instance.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilder.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StringBuilder class using the specified string.
member.param: The string used to initialize the value of the instance. If value is null, the new StringBuilder will contain the empty string (that is, it contains Empty).

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StringBuilder class.
